name: 12th International Conference on Tropical Medicine and Infectious Diseases
content: It is our great pleasure to invite you to participate in the 12th International Conference on Tropical Medicine and Infectious Diseases (Tropical Diseases 2023) to be held in London, UK | February 22-23, 2023\. Theme: Discovering Advanced Research and New Insights for a Disease-Free Life This new and exciting 2023 conference in London features outstanding internationally known microbiologist and bacteriologist from premier medical universities, hospitals and other specialties from all over the globe. The conference format will feature new interactive workshop sessions for both Tropical Diseases, and Infectious Diseases which will discuss new updates and management, as well as State of the Art talks on a variety of Tropical and Infectious diseases in multiple subspecialties.
